recipe.title: Party Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: 1/4 cup each dark-brown sugar, chili powder, fresh lemon juice and Worcestershire sauce
3 cloves of garlic, very finely minced
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a slow boil; cook until thickened (25-30 minutes), stirring constantly to prevent the sauce from scorching. Strain into a bowl to remove the onion and garlic. Cool, then refrigerate for 2 days.
